name: Laura Bennett
bio: Passionate art historian with 5 years experience guiding in London galleries. Moving to Oxford and excited to share my knowledge of Renaissance art and modern British artists.

name: Raj Patel
bio: Cambridge graduate and technology enthusiast. I offer unique tours focusing on Cambridge's contribution to computing and science, from Newton to the modern tech scene.

name: Claire Morrison
bio: Professional actor and theater director. I specialize in Oxford's theatrical heritage, including backstage tours and stories from famous productions. Dramatic flair guaranteed!

name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
bio: Islamic art specialist and Middle Eastern history expert. I offer tours focusing on Oxford's Oriental collections and the influence of Middle Eastern scholarship on Western academia.

name: Hannah O'Connor
bio: Wildlife biologist and birdwatching expert. I lead nature tours through Oxford's parks and countryside, teaching identification skills and conservation awareness.
